meanings.definition: A person or animal that excretes waste material from the body.
meanings.sent1: The excreters in the zoo help keep the enclosures clean.
meanings.sent2: The excreters in the forest play a vital role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The excreters at the petting zoo are quite popular with the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The excreters in the ocean release nutrients that benefit marine life.
meanings.sent5: The excreters in the garden fertilize the soil naturally.

meanings.definition: The act of excreting waste material from the body.
meanings.sent1: Cleaning up after the excreters is an important task at the sanctuary.
meanings.sent2: The excreters during hibernation slow down to conserve energy.
meanings.sent3: The excreters during the race made a pit stop at the restroom.
meanings.sent4: The excreters of ideas can lead to creative breakthroughs.
meanings.sent5: The excreters of toxins must be handled carefully to avoid contamination.
